amendment.description: Amendment prevents the payment of attorney's fees as part of any settlement the Federal Government enters into under the Clean Air Act, the Clean Water Act, and the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent the payment of attorney's fees as part of any settlement the Federal Government enters into under the Clean Air Act, the Clean Water Act, and the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 199 (Roll no. 357).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 199 (Roll no. 357).
